issue.title: [Urban Feature] Access to simulation robot logfile?

content.raw:
@{5b5b1c941394ae6a72c021df} each vehicle runs on a separate instance and their `/robot_data*` topics do not overlap.

When testing, I use a relay with message dropping to keep bags small when testing to record maps i.e.:
`<node pkg="topic_tools" type="drop" name="$(anon relay_map)" args="/$(arg name)/map 9 10 /robot_data/$(arg name)/map" respawn="true"    />`
that drops 9/10 messages from `/$(arg name)/map` when relaying to `/robot_data/$(arg name)/map` for recording.

You can then use a bag combining tool to stitch all of the bags back together and strip the `/robot_data*` prefix if you're interested in having a singular bag per experiment.
